ygData.subject: RE: [rodcet] Special Announcement -- An EQ Wedding
ygData.msgSnippet: There is nothing wrong with a high elf marrying a woodelf :) -joe Fentus Fayspark-Faywood
ygData.messageBody:
There is nothing wrong with a high elf marrying a woodelf :)

-joe
Fentus Fayspark-Faywood

On Tue, 19 Sep 2000, Jamison Sacks wrote:

> A joyous event indeed
> Will be interesting to see how snobby elves react to one of their kind
> marrying a woody..
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: David Lari [mailto:kerik@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, September 19, 2000 7:32 AM
> To: EQ_rainbow; rodcet@...
> Subject: [rodcet] Special Announcement -- An EQ Wedding
>
>
> A chilly evening in the West Commons (on Rodcet Nife server)
> ----------------------------
> Kerik the Wood Elf Druid worked hastily to set up the tent. Eizen
> appeared about ready to nod off at any moment. As had become their usual
> habit, Kerik ported his cleric friend to the commons and the two men spent
> the night next to the druid ring, wrapped in each others arms. Kerik
> struggled and fumbled with the tent. Nerves! he thought. Must relax. He took
> a deep, calming breath.
> It had been a busy night. He'd been helping Gotham in her quest to kill
> asps when news reached him that Adessa had been seen dancing naked around
> Eizen. There was even a rumor they had made love. Kerik was so angry he
> couldn't see straight. His first inclination had been to leave Eizen. But
> his heart wouldn't let him. He needed Eizen. He just hadn't been able to
> take that next step.
> His brother, Jono, had almost convinced him to go ahead and ask for
> Eizen's hand. But Jono had left Faydwer at an early age and wasn't aware of
> the class system -- wasn't aware of how the high elves looked down upon
> their woodland kin. To Jono, it was just a matter of following one's heart.
> But to Kerik, it was more complicated. What would Eizen's parents think?
> Wouldn't they abandon their son for marrying a dirty wood elf? Did he really
> want to put Eizen in a position to choose between him and his entire
> culture? And then there was the fear of outright rejection. What is Eizen
> just didn't want to marry him? Maybe he should just maintain the status quo,
> he had thought.
> Then Adessa came along. Kerik knew he had to act now or never. After
> getting over his anger, he quickly began trying to find a ring. After a long
> wait on what must have been the slowest Paladin in all of Norrath, Kerik was
> able to purchase a ring.
> Now, if he could just get the tent set up. There. It was done. And Eizen
> was in it already and about to nod off. "Wait..." Kerik implored. He had
> rehearsed this moment in his head so many times. He would kneel. Then hand
> Eizen the ring and ask him to marry him. But Eizen's sleepy eyes and Kerik's
> nervousness ruined his well rehearsed plan.
> Instead, he quickly dug around his pocket for the ring. It was gone!
> Where could it be? Then he remembered... he was wearing the Forman's Tunic
> Eizen had just given him and the ring was in his old Lockjaw vest. He
> grabbed the ring and stretched out his shaking hand to Eizen without saying
> a word. Eizen looked at the ring and saw it was an engagement ring. Kerik
> looked into Eizen's eyes for some kind of sign as to whether he was going to
> accept it or not. After what seemed like forever, Eizen smiled as he took
> the ring and placed it on his finger.
> "You took it," Kerik said surprised more than anything but filled with
> joy too, as tears welled up in his eyes.
> Eizen smiled back at him. "Weren't you supposed to kneel down on one
> knee?"
> Kerik shrugged and stared at the ground in embarrassment. "I was too
> nervous and thought you were about to fall asleep."
> Eizen wiped the tears from Kerik's eyes and they held each other for the
> longest time.
>
> ===============================
> Eizen, High Elven Cleric of the 35th season and Kerik Rainbow, Wood Elf
> Druid of the 31st season announce their engagement to be married at a time
> and place to be determined. The entire Mystic Alliance guild and all other
> interested parties will be invited to attend the ceremony and reception.
> There will be plenty of food and drink for all. (Hope to have some actual
> wedding cake now that the recipe has been discovered.)
>
> The grooms are registered at Leather and Hide, Jade's Jewelry shop and other
> fine stores in Freeport and surrounding areas.
>
> /ooc Everyone from the EQ Rainbow list will be invited to join us on the
> Rodcet Nife server for the big event. Once we have determined a location, if
> you don't have a character on the server, you can create one in the closest
> starting city. We are looking for a location that will not be KOS to anyone
> and we should have plenty of people available to provide ports as well. If
> you've been thinking about coming over and visiting us in the largest
> gay/gay friendly guild in Norrath, this will be a great to chance to meet
> everyone. The event will take place some time after the 6th of October as I
> (Kerik) will be out of town.
>
> Hugs,
> David
>
